thread.section_title: Public Storage Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Public Storage | publicstorage.com | 4 of 599
thread.title: Deborah Peterson
thread.title_full: Public Storage reviewed by Deborah Peterson

author: Deborah Peterson
title: Deborah Peterson
text:
I was forced to make a sudden move, and fortunately Public Storage was right down the street. When talking to the CS REP, he was very understanding of my situation and worked to get me the best service I could afford at the time. Thank you David!
When arriving at my unit at Public Storage, the onsite manager was just as helpful and compassionate to my situation. She made sure that she was available for me as I was feeling very sadden by the current situation and my transition easier. Thank you Randi!
